alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 3:46AM MST until February 14 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to around 45 mph expected. Areas of blowing dust likely with reduced visibilities. * WHERE...Western Pima County and Tohono O`odham Nation. * WHEN...This afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
